explains: v. 检查，审视；检阅，视察；进行检查，进行视察

sentences.en: Elaine went outside to inspect the playing field.
sentences.cn: 伊莱恩到外边去检查运动场。

sentences.en: Public health officials were called in to inspect the premises.
sentences.cn: 公共卫生官员奉召来视察了建筑物。

sentences.en: Public health officials were called in to inspect the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 公共卫生官员被召来视察了这家餐馆。
